amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to accelerate the increase in the refundability of the child tax credit, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 845 proposed by Senator Bingaman for Senator Lincoln to Amendment SA 539. To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to accelerate the increase in the refundability of the child tax credit, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 845 proposed by Senator Bingaman for Senator Lincoln to Amendment SA 539.
